title: Electric current - circuit with resistive material

content.question:
A circuit is comprised of a battery and a long, straight piece of resistive material, as shown in the figure. Which of the following gives the direction of both the electric field and the net motion of electrons within the resistive material?
Electric FieldNet Motion of ElectronsAToward the top of the figureToward the top of the figureBToward the top of the figureToward the bottom of the figureCToward the bottom of the figureToward the top of the figureDToward the bottom of the figureToward the bottom of the figure

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
